data.title: Home
data.meta_description: Lawo designs and manufactures pioneering IP-based video and audio technology for broadcast production, live performance and theater applications.
data.text:
​Hyper-Density SDI/IP Conversion and Routing Platform.

.edge is your broadcast and AV genie, ready to perform its magic when summoned. A one-of-a-kind CAPEX/OPEX solution, it allows you to add hardware and software functionality via software licenses—even for a limited time.

Like the cockpit of a high-end sports car, the diamond mixing console exemplifies performance, quality, and purposeful design.

Native IP, of course. Completely modular; configurable to your most specific wishes. Scalable from as few as 2 to as many as 60 physical faders.

A global leader for products and services in broadcast live production and infrastructure.

In 2020, Lawo celebrated 50 years of engineering the future. The privately-owned corporation has grown into an industry-wide accepted innovator that continues to actively shape the future of broadcast and media production.

Lawo offers an inspiring entrepreneurial atmosphere with the freedom and plenty of opportunities to grow your professional career with a rapidly expanding market leader!

Spearheading technological developments in the broadcast industry for decades, Lawo is at the forefront of the next big revolution: the broadcast industry’s migration towards IP-based video, audio and control infrastructures.
